title: Mirzokhidjon Yakubov
text:
Download My Resume


Professional Experience
Chief Specialist, International cooperation and working with WTO Division Central Bank of Uzbekistan, Tashkent, Uzbekistan July 2023 – June 2024

Represent the interests of the Central Bank in interactions with international financial institutions.
Monitor the Central Bank’s fulfillment of obligations under agreements with international organizations.
Oversee the accreditation of representative offices of foreign banks.

Chief Economist, Working with International Financial Institutions Unit Central Bank of Uzbekistan, Tashkent, Uzbekistan February 2023 – June 2023

Worked with international financial institutions and participated in the development and coordination of projects related to interstate, intergovernmental, and inter-agency agreements.
Developed and coordinated agreements with international financial institutions.

Lead Economist, Working with International Financial Institutions Unit Central Bank of Uzbekistan, Tashkent, Uzbekistan April 2021 – February 2023

Elaborated on issues and organized work to attract technical assistance from international financial institutions and foreign central banks.
Coordinated and organized the work of ministries and agencies concerning annual IMF missions.

Director Southern Leader LLC, Termez, Uzbekistan December 2019 – August 2020

Managed all financial aspects, including overseeing financial statements, budgeting, and financial decision-making.
Made strategic decisions and managed personnel, including the hiring of employees based on their expertise.




Education

Sejong University, Seoul, Korea

Bachelor of Business Administration, 2014-2018
Bachelor of Tourism Management, 2014-2018

Pusan National University, Busan, Korea

Korean Language Course, 2013-2014

title: About Me
text: Welcome to my portfolio website! This site showcases my work and professional achievements, including a collection of certificates I have earned.

title: Mirzokhidjon Yakubov | MBA. Student
text:
I am an MBA student at the University of Canada West (UCW). As a dedicated and experienced Chief Specialist with a strong background in international financial institutions, I have cultivated extensive expertise in financial expertise, project coordination, and leadership. My career has focused on representing the interests of the Central Bank of Uzbekistan.
I began my research career as a Lead Economist and later became a Chief Economist, where I worked with international financial institutions and coordinated projects related to various agreements and missions. Prior to my work at the Central Bank, I managed a company where I was responsible for all financial aspects and strategic decisions. The experience of living and studying abroad has broadened my horizons and enriched my adaptability. I am a multilingual professional, proficient in four languages
